metadata.title: CVE-2018-20430 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU Libextractor through 1.8 has an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in thefunction history_extract() in plugins/ole2_extractor.c, related toEXTRACTOR_common_convert_to_utf8 in common/convert.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20430` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extract - 1:1.9-2
libextractor3 - 1:1.9-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libextractor package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.9-2').
